actions.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment increases Pension and Welfare Benefits Administration funding by $300,000 for genetic nondiscrimination enforcement activities and reduces Bureau of Labor Statistics funding accordingly.
purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the Department of Labor, Pension Benefits and Welfare Benefits program for genetic nondiscrimination enforcement activities by $300,000 and to reduce funds appropriated for salaries and expenses within the Bureau of Labor Statistics comensurately.
